com.whaleal.mars.core.query

类 Update

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whaleal.mars.core.query.Update
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    UpdateDefinition
    直接已知子类:
    BasicUpdate

    public class Update
extends Object
implements UpdateDefinition
    Class to easily construct MongoDB update clauses.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  Update.AbstractModifier
      Abstract Update.Modifier implementation with defaults for Object.equals(Object), Object.hashCode() and Object.toString().
      class  Update.AddToSetBuilder
      Builder for creating $addToSet modifier.
      static class  Update.BitwiseOperatorBuilder 
      private static class  Update.Each
      Implementation of Update.Modifier representing $each.
      static interface  Update.Modifier
      Marker interface of nested commands.
      static class  Update.Modifiers
      Modifiers holds a distinct collection of Update.Modifier
      static class  Update.Position 
      private static class  Update.PositionModifier
      Update.Modifier implementation used to propagate $position.
      class  Update.PushOperatorBuilder
      Builder for creating $push modifiers
      private static class  Update.Slice
      Implementation of Update.Modifier representing $slice.
      private static class  Update.SortModifier
      Implementation of Update.Modifier representing $sort.

    • 方法详细资料

      • update

        public static Update update(String key,
                            Object value)
        Static factory method to create an Update using the provided key
        参数:
        key - the field to update.
        返回:
        new instance of Update.

      • fromDocument

        public static Update fromDocument(org.bson.Document object,
                                  String... exclude)
        Creates an Update instance from the given Document. Allows to explicitly exclude fields from making it into the created Update object. Note, that this will set attributes directly and not use $set. This means fields not given in the Document will be nulled when executing the update. To create an only-updating Update instance of a Document, call set(String, Object) for each value in it.
        参数:
        object - the source Document to create the update from.
        exclude - the fields to exclude.
        返回:
        new instance of Update.

      • isKeyword

        private static boolean isKeyword(String key)
        Inspects given key for '$'.
        参数:
        key - the field name.
        返回:
        true if given key is prefixed.

      • set

        public Update set(String key,
                  Object value)
        Update using the $set update modifier
        参数:
        key - the field name.
        value - can be null. In this case the property remains in the db with a null value. To remove it use unset(String).
        返回:
        this.
        另请参阅:
        MongoDB Update operator: $set

      • push

        public Update.PushOperatorBuilder push(String key)
        Update using $push modifier.
        Allows creation of $push command for single or multiple (using $each) values as well as using $position.
        参数:
        key - the field name.
        返回:
        Update.PushOperatorBuilder for given key
        另请参阅:
        MongoDB Update operator: $push, MongoDB Update operator: $each

      • pushAll

        @Deprecated
public Update pushAll(String key,
                                  Object[] values)
        已过时。 as of MongoDB 2.4. Removed in MongoDB 3.6. Use $push $each instead.
        Update using the $pushAll update modifier.
        Note: In MongoDB 2.4 the usage of $pushAll has been deprecated in favor of $push $each. Important: As of MongoDB 3.6 $pushAll is not longer supported. Use $push $each instead. push(String)) returns a builder that can be used to populate the $each object.
        参数:
        key - the field name.
        values - must not be null.
        返回:
        this.
        另请参阅:
        MongoDB Update operator: $pushAll

      • addToSet

        public Update.AddToSetBuilder addToSet(String key)
        Update using $addToSet modifier.
        Allows creation of $push command for single or multiple (using $each) values
        参数:
        key - the field name.
        返回:
        new instance of Update.AddToSetBuilder.

      • isolated

        public Update isolated()
        Prevents a write operation that affects multiple documents from yielding to other reads or writes once the first document is written.
        返回:
        this.

      • filterArray

        public Update filterArray(CriteriaDefinition criteria)
        Filter elements in an array that match the given criteria for update. CriteriaDefinition is passed directly to the driver without further type or field mapping.
        参数:
        criteria - must not be null.
        返回:
        this.

      • filterArray

        public Update filterArray(String identifier,
                          Object expression)
        Filter elements in an array that match the given criteria for update. expression is used directly with the driver without further further type or field mapping.
        参数:
        identifier - the positional operator identifier filter criteria name.
        expression - the positional operator filter expression.
        返回:
        this.

      • isIsolated

        public Boolean isIsolated()
        从接口复制的说明: UpdateDefinition
        If true prevents a write operation that affects multiple documents from yielding to other reads or writes once the first document is written.
        指定者:
        isIsolated 在接口中 UpdateDefinition
        返回:
        true if update isolated is set.

      • getUpdateObject

        public org.bson.Document getUpdateObject()
        指定者:
        getUpdateObject 在接口中 UpdateDefinition
        返回:
        the actual update in its native Document format. Never null.

      • getArrayFilters

        public List<UpdateDefinition.ArrayFilter> getArrayFilters()
        从接口复制的说明: UpdateDefinition
        Get the specification which elements to modify in an array field. UpdateDefinition.ArrayFilter are passed directly to the driver without further type or field mapping.
        指定者:
        getArrayFilters 在接口中 UpdateDefinition
        返回:
        never null.
